Package src.java.query

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryReader
    A reader of a file that contains queries for the InvertedIndex.
    QueryResultWriter
    A writer for the results of the queries after they have been processed.
    QueryUpdater
    Updates the queries to influence their results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColumnResultWriter
    An implementation of QueryResultWriter, writes the query results on disk with the following format:
    query_id doc_id doc_score 1 1 4 1 4 4 ...
    DocumentIndex
    This data structure stores vector of term weight for each document
    Query
    An object representation of a query.
    QueryIndex
    A extension of the class Index that is used to index queries and their respective vectors
    QueryLoader
    An implementation of QueryReader.
